p: The phylogenetic analysis revealed that the reported NoV GII.17 sequences are grouped into four different clades: clade A, which comprises strains circulating in the year 1978, clade B compring strains detected from 2002 to 2007, and clades C and D, comprising strains detected after 2013. The strains found in our study were all clustered in clade D (Figs.Â 2 and 3).
